titleStmt.title: Dr. Burnet's letter to his friend in London. Being an answer to a late scurrilous pamphlet entituled His farewel.
titleStmt.author: G. B.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G.C. for A. Gad,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end "G.B.", but according to J.E.S. Clarke and H.C. Foxcroft, "A life of Gilbert Burnet", p. 554, G.B. is not Gilbert Burnet, but rather "a mere pamphleteer" whose work "may be founded on Burnet's conversation or a letter from him".
